lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The aircraft hit Mount Osutaka, north of Tokyo, on August 12, 1985, after a bulkhead separating the pressurised cabin from the unpressurised tail suddenly burst, fracturing key navigation systems.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The lawyers said Boeing had showed it believed the crash was due to design defects by specifying two design modifications to prevent a recurrence in a memorandum filed in King County, Washington, Superior Court last March 24.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A press statement by a group of lawyers representing victims of the crash criticised the report for not dealing in greater depth with the fail-safe aspect.
